system.description:
You have grown wise, and with wisdom comes a need to pass it on.

REQUIREMENTS

To become The Mentor, you have found an apprentice worth teaching.

The Mentor starts with the Move New Apprentice.

Important: Mentor Moves cannot be taken by Powerful Playbooks, even ones that can take any Destiny Move.
